desc.en: After meeting Shiroko, Sensei explains that he is on a business trip but gets lost. Shiroko says that the surrounding areas have long been abandoned, and offers Sensei a can of energy drink. Later, Shiroko carries Sensei and arrives at school.

desc.zh_tw: 老师在遇见了白子之后，向白子表示自己是来出差的，但苦于找不到路。白子表示周边地区均已废弃，并向老师递能量饮料喝。之后，白子背着老师到达了学校。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.jp: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.thai: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.ko: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.zh_tw: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的對策委員會学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。

desc.en: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone is amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduces themselves.
desc.jp: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone is amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduces themselves.
desc.thai: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone is amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduces themselves.
desc.ko: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone is amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduces themselves.
desc.zh_tw: 在击退头盔圈后，众人对老师刚刚的指挥感到赞叹不已；之后众人分别介绍了自己与對策委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在击退头盔圈后，众人对老师刚刚的指挥感到赞叹不已；之后众人分别介绍了自己与对策委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在击退头盔圈后，众人对老师刚刚的指挥感到赞叹不已；之后众人分别介绍了自己与对策委员会。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.jp: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.thai: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.ko: The students explain to Sensei that their school's over 900 million yen in debt and how difficult it is for them to even keep up with interest payments. When Sensei offers to help, Serika goes off on a tirade about how grown-ups can't be trusted.
desc.zh_tw: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是茜香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是芹香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是茜香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师听说阿拜多斯高中欠下的债务超过9亿日圆，仅靠学生的力量光是偿还利息就喘不过气。老师虽想帮忙学生，但是芹香却生气地表示自己信不过大人。

desc.en: Back at school, everyone thanks Sensei but accidentally slips the "debt" thing. Serika expresses her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and leave. Nonomi follows her up.
desc.jp: Back at school, everyone thanks Sensei but accidentally slips the "debt" thing. Serika expresses her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and leave. Nonomi follows her up.
desc.thai: Back at school, everyone thanks Sensei but accidentally slips the "debt" thing. Serika expresses her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and leave. Nonomi follows her up.
desc.ko: Back at school, everyone thanks Sensei but accidentally slips the "debt" thing. Serika expresses her trust issues on Sensei, unwilling to talk about that topic and leave. Nonomi follows her up.
desc.zh_tw: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。茜香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，野乃美跟随前往。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。芹香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，野宫跟随前往。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 回到学校后，众人向老师道谢，却不小心说出了还债一事。芹香表示对老师不太信任，因而不太愿意讨论这个话题，选择离开，野宫跟随前往。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: From what the Hoshino and Ayane says, Sensei acknowledges the debt worth 962.36 million yen. Sensei also knows that sandstorms keep occurring in recent years, and no efforts are achieved despite the large amount of funds that the school has put into it. As no banks are willing to lend them money, they are forced to turn to loan sharks. The deserialization only goes worse and worse, together with the skyrocketing debt; as a result, many students has left the school.

desc.zh_tw: 从星野和綾音口中，老师获知了阿拜多斯欠下9亿6235万元债务的事情，并且得知阿拜多斯地区近年经常发生沙尘暴，学校虽投入大量资金却仍无法逆转；由于没有银行愿意为他们贷款，他们不得不转向高利贷公司，但沙漠化越来越严重，债务水涨船高，偿还无望，导致很多学生离开。

desc.en: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.thai: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.ko: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_tw: 顺利从头盔团手中救出茜香的老师和對策委員會学生们。战斗后，綾音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 顺利从头盔团手中救出芹香的老师和对策委员会学生们。战斗后，绫音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。

desc.en: Though Serika is rescued, she still falls apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Shiroko brings Serika to the infirmary. Ayane finds out that the Helmet Gang seem to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a mastermind in the dark.
desc.jp: Though Serika is rescued, she still falls apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Shiroko brings Serika to the infirmary. Ayane finds out that the Helmet Gang seem to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a mastermind in the dark.

desc.ko: Though Serika is rescued, she still falls apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Shiroko brings Serika to the infirmary. Ayane finds out that the Helmet Gang seem to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a mastermind in the dark.
desc.zh_tw: 虽然救出了茜香，但吃了一发防空导弹的茜香还是支棱不住。白子将茜香送到了医护室。綾音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然救出了芹香，但吃了一发防空导弹的芹香还是支棱不住。白子将芹香送到了医护室。绫音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

name.en: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.jp: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.thai: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68
name.ko: The Ramen Store and Problem Solver 68

desc.en: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.jp: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.thai: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.ko: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.zh_tw: 众人决定带綾音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。亞瑠跟對策委員會交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。阿露跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。亚瑠跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。爱露跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force learn that Problem Solver 68 is a group of delinquents from Gehenna Academy and that the Helmet Gang's weapons came from the Black Market. Sensei and the students head there to investigate.

desc.zh_tw: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,對策委員會学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和對策委員會学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是歌赫娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 综合从之前的战斗中收集到的情报,对策委员会学生查出，<便利屋68>的职员是格黑娜出身的不良学生，以及头盔团所使用的武器是从<黑市>流入的事实。老师和对策委员会学生为了寻找其他线索而前往黑市。

desc.en: On the way to school, Sensei meets Ayane. Ayane says she is going to prepare for the debt payment at school and has found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It is then that Mutsuki appears. Mutsuki invites Sensei to pay a visit on them, but is scolded by Ayane before leaving.
desc.jp: On the way to school, Sensei meets Ayane. Ayane says she is going to prepare for the debt payment at school and has found everything about the Problem Solver 68. It is then that Mutsuki appears. Mutsuki invites Sensei to pay a visit on them, but is scolded by Ayane before leaving.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Ayane finds out all the information of Problem Solver 68, stressing that they are seen as problem children in Gehenna, and therefore they should be handled with extra caution. On the other hand, Ayane thinks that if they need to find the origin of the illegal weapons, they might have to visit the Black Market.

On the other hand, Ayane thinks that if they need to find the origin of the illegal weapons, they might have to visit the Black Market.

desc.zh_tw: 綾音查清了便利屋68四人的资料，指出他们在格黑娜也被视为问题儿童，因而应多加小心。另一方面，綾音认为要想找到违禁武器的源头，可能需要到黑市一趟。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绫音查清了便利屋68四人的资料，指出他们在歌赫娜也被视为问题儿童，因而应多加小心。另一方面，绫音认为要想找到违禁武器的源头，可能需要到黑市一趟。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 绫音查清了便利屋68四人的资料，指出他们在格黑娜也被视为问题儿童，因而应多加小心。另一方面，绫音认为要想找到违禁武器的源头，可能需要到黑市一趟。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.jp: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.thai: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.ko: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.zh_tw: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，對策委員會一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，对策委员会一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，对策委员会一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，对策委员会一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。

desc.en: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.jp: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.thai: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.ko: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.zh_tw: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对阿拜多斯图谋不轨。

desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.thai: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.ko: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠用向對策委員會成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亞瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亞瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，阿露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的阿露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亚瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亚瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，爱露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的爱露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.jp: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遙香则布置好了炸弹。無月不解为什么亞瑠不先收钱办事，亞瑠则说是怕被客户干涉太多。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.en: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.jp: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.thai: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.ko: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遙香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而春香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.en: The ramen restaurant owner mistakes the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realizes that it was the restaurant that prevents her being a real villain. Haruka, who is unsure of Aru's intention, still blows up the restaurant without a second thought.
desc.jp: The ramen restaurant owner mistakes the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realizes that it was the restaurant that prevents her being a real villain. Haruka, who is unsure of Aru's intention, still blows up the restaurant without a second thought.

desc.zh_tw: 拉面店老板错认便利屋68为阿拜多斯的朋友，亞瑠突然间领悟到了什么，认为是这家拉面店阻碍了她成为真正的坏蛋。遙香尚未听清就反手炸掉了拉面店。

desc.en: Sensei meets Nonomi at the school gate and Nonomi asks the physical conditions of Master Shiba. Sensei says he is in good conditions, but Nonomi guesses it right that there might be some other problems. Nonomi purposes to go back to the classroom and expresses her appreciation for Sensei's help these days. Nonomi hopes that Sensei could continue going with them and Sensei assures.

desc.zh_tw: 老师在校门口遇到了野乃美，询问了下柴大将的身体情况。老师表示他身体情况不错，但被野乃美猜出大概还有其他问题。野乃美提议先回教室，并表达了对老师这些天来处理事情得感激之情，希望老师能够继续与他们走下去。老师表示了肯定。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Shiroko seems to be questioning Hoshino seriously, but Hoshino pretends to know nothing. Nonomi and Sensei break into the room, yet none of them mentions anything - only "something with Hoshino". Nonomi says there's nothing should be hid between the Task Force, and Hoshino is forced to admit that it was only "Shiroko scolding her for sleeping too much". Despite that, Nonomi senses dishonest in it.

desc.zh_tw: 白子似乎在对星野进行着严肃的质问，但星野一问三不知。野乃美和老师闻声赶到，但两人之字不提，只是表示“与星野有些事而已”。野乃美表示對策委員會间可没有什么好隐藏的，星野于是不得不表示“只是自己睡午觉太多而被白子骂了”而已。尽管如此，野乃美还是看出了其中的不真诚。

desc.en: Serika and Ayane has obtained a map of land ownership throughout Abydos and confirmed an emergency. Initially, most of them, including Hoshino, thought that Abydos is obviously owned by the school; yet based on the transaction records, the most of the land has long been owned by the Kaiser Group.

desc.en: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.

desc.ko: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會从星野口中听说昔日往事。现在推测，消失的阿拜多斯学生会为了偿还债务，结果但却连土地都被凯萨抢走了。老师依照从阳奈那里听说的，提议前往阿拜多斯沙漠。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会从星野口中听说昔日往事。现在推测，消失的阿拜多斯学生会为了偿还债务，结果但却连土地都被凯萨抢走了。老师依照从阳奈那里听说的，提议前往阿拜多斯沙漠。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会从星野口中听说昔日往事。现在推测，消失的阿拜多斯学生会为了偿还债务，结果但却连土地都被凯萨抢走了。老师依照从阳奈那里听说的，提议前往阿拜多斯沙漠。

desc.en: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.
desc.jp: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.

Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.
desc.zh_tw: 事实是，阿拜多斯的大多数土地均已归属于凯撒集团（凯撒建设）。众人不仅对为何要夺走这么多土地表示疑问，也不解究竟是怎么办到的。星野和綾音表示，由于学生会有学校的最高权限，因而这些交易应都是由前学生会的人所做。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事实是，阿拜多斯的大多数土地均已归属于凯撒集团（凯撒建设）。众人不仅对为何要夺走这么多土地表示疑问，也不解究竟是怎么办到的。星野和绫音表示，由于学生会有学校的最高权限，因而这些交易应都是由前学生会的人所做。

desc.en: Hoshino describes the situation back then, and in a nutshell, it was in chaos. The desertification was extremely serious at then, and the school was forced to relocate for several times. Not only did the student number dropping fast, teachers nowhere to find, but also most of the student union had resigned. There was only one left, but that person was unreliable, just like Hoshino had a bad temper at then, according to Hoshino. Everyone is shocked by the fact. Shiroko says Hoshino has no need to belittle herself, saying that she is a responsible president.

desc.zh_tw: 星野阐述了当时情况，总结起来十分混乱。当时荒漠化已经非常严重，学校被迫搬迁数次。不仅学生只剩下两位数、教职工基本不存在导致教学停止，学生会的人也大多已经辞职，只剩下另外一位前辈。但星野表示那位前辈也不靠谱，而她那时性格也并不怎样。众人对此表示惊异。白字表示星野没有必要这么贬低自己，表示她是个很有责任感的会长。

desc.en: Everyone starts to discuss why the school would have decided to sell the land to Kaiser. Everyone thinks it is because of the debts. However, due to the low selling prices, it was no use after all. Sensei suddenly notices that, both the lender and buyer are all Kaiser, and Abydos is in fact in a trap, whose goal might actually be the land of Abydos. Serika can't understand why the student union would do such things, but Hoshino says that people would certainly do such if they are cornered.

desc.zh_tw: 大家开始讨论学校究竟为什么要把土地卖给凯撒集团。大家普遍认为是债款已经堆积过多导致，但由于出售价格过低，实际上也没有什么用。这时老师突然注意到，贷款方和购买方似乎都是凯撒集团，阿拜多斯实际上中了凯撒集团的圈套，后者目标很可能是阿拜多斯的土地。茜香无法理解学生会为什么会做出这样的决定，但星野则表示，走投无路的人们的确会做出这样的事。

desc.en: With current clues on hand, Ayane finally confirms that Kaiser's goal is exactly the land of Abydos. The exact reason remains unknown. Sensei tells everyone the things he heard from Hina, and everyone decides to go to the desert immediately.

desc.en: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.

desc.zh_tw: 走之前，白子叫住了老师。在一间教室里，白子向老师展示了从星野书包中找到的东西：退社信，對策委員會小鸟游星野。老师问白子为什么会这么做，白子则表示是因为他觉得星野最近的行为非常怪异，之中一定有不可告人的东西。

desc.en: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.jp: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.

desc.zh_tw: 凯萨的干部表明自己在找寻埋在阿拜多斯某处的宝物的野心，而且还利用债券压迫對策委員會。星野带着气愤的對策委員會一行人暂时撤退。

desc.en: Ako talked big and claimed that she could write 1000 pages, but didn't expect Hina would actually be doing so. During the break, Ako asks Hina whether she knew about Hoshino. Hina says it's the first time for her to meet her, and discloses that she's listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino does seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentions about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticizes Ako for being too impulsive.

Hina also mentions about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticizes Ako for being too impulsive.
desc.zh_tw: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏萊等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被歌赫娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏莱等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏莱等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在沙勒等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。

desc.en: Kaiser Director introduces himself to everyone, which is immediately got under fire. But the director doesn't care, and says that given the current situation, it is true that the Foreclosure Task Force has invaded their own private lands. He also says that the troops are all for searching treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. Nobody is convinced, and director demonstrates just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".

desc.zh_tw: 凯撒理事向各位介绍了自己的身份。众人对PMC理事开始口诛笔伐，但后者并不在乎。就事论事，對策委員會一行人目前是侵犯了他们的私有土地，并大方地指出自己是为了寻找阿拜多斯地底下的某个宝贝，而这些兵力也绝非为了入侵阿拜多斯。众人很不相信，理事于是便现场演示了“如何真正处置阿拜多斯”。

desc.en: Kaiser Director makes a call and says that Abydos High School's credit is at all-time low, and the interest rate will be raised 30 times higher. At the club room, Ayane answers the call and is greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also says that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advises them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one is willing to step a step back. Hoshino says that it's useless to argue here and suggests to leave first.

desc.zh_tw: 凯撒理事打了个电话，表示阿拜多斯学校的信用已降到最低，并上调了30倍利率。在社团室的綾音收到了来电，大受震撼。凯撒理事表示，为了证明还款能力，他们必须先提前交纳一笔保证金，但那根本不可能做到——理事此时便提出让他们放弃学校，进行退学或转学。众人拒不后退。星野表示在这里争论没有用，提议先行离开。

desc.en: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.

desc.zh_tw: 把气愤的学妹们送回家后，星野把身穿黑西装的男人曾向自己提出秘密交易的事告诉老师。虽然老师替星野打气加油，但隔天星野却留下自动退学书消失踪影。

desc.en: Hoshino remembers the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.

She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.

She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.zh_tw: 星野记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对未来的一切充满希望，认定阿拜多斯的未来并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了星野。但星野打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.

desc.ko: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.zh_tw: 夢是阿拜多斯前學生會的主席。她曾與星野一起工作，對未來抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一張與星野一起拍的合照上出現過。當前沒有更多關於她的訊息，但有些人認為她可能已經死了，如在第一篇和最終篇中所呈現的一樣。

desc.en: Everyone still can't understand what PMC is looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils has long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko says she wanted to investigate it first, but gets caught by Ayane to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advises everyone to calm down and return to take rests first.

desc.zh_tw: 众人还是不理解PMC究竟在找什么，毕竟石油之类的高价值物品已被探明并不存在。白子想先去调查一下，但被綾音识出可能实为去抢银行，遭到阻止。星野让大家冷静下来，先行回去休息。

desc.en: Shiroko and Sensei waits into the night. Hoshino sends Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remains in the classroom and takes out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tries to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agrees to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.

desc.zh_tw: 白子和老师等到很晚才离开。星野因疲劳打发走了白子，但老师并未离开。老师拿出了星野的退社信，星野想把问题转移到白子上，但老师紧追不放。星野同意向老师讲述情况，但得出去到走廊上。

desc.en: Hoshino suspects that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seems to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino says that she has never seen anyone like him in Kivotos, and it appears to her that even Kaiser Director fears him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino says it is nothing serious and rips it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino says she'll made it clear for everyone, but also feels that it is the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei makes a promise to Hoshino that he will eventually come up with solutions.

desc.zh_tw: 星野推测PMC（尤其是黑服）似乎是在招募一些能手。星野表示她从没在基沃托斯见过他那样的人，而且似乎凯撒集团的理事也很怕他。至于退社信，星野表示只是脑袋一时糊涂，在老师面前撕掉了它。星野还表示明天会和大家说清楚，但又觉得接受那个请求似乎唯一无二。星野走前，老师承诺会想出解决方案。

desc.en: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.jp: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.thai: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.ko: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.zh_tw: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余對策委員會一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。

desc.en: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.jp: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.thai: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.ko: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.zh_tw: 星野留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，星野向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半阿拜多斯债务”的事情。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: In another letter, Hoshino confesses that she does, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.

desc.zh_tw: 星野在另一封信中坦白，自己并不喜欢大人，也不相信大人。在白子第一次将老师背来时，她甚至有点嫌弃，但最终她信任了老师。她还将白子托付给了老师，希望老师能教导管好白子，不要让她犯错。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。

desc.en: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.
desc.jp: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.
desc.thai: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.

desc.en: After the fact, Sensei receives a letter from Ayane. Though the Foreclosure Task Force wasn't able to pay off its debt in full, she thanks [USERNAME] Sensei for preserving the group's usual way of life.
desc.jp: After the fact, Sensei receives a letter from Ayane. Though the Foreclosure Task Force wasn't able to pay off its debt in full, she thanks [USERNAME] Sensei for preserving the group's usual way of life.
desc.thai: After the fact, Sensei receives a letter from Ayane. Though the Foreclosure Task Force wasn't able to pay off its debt in full, she thanks [USERNAME] Sensei for preserving the group's usual way of life.
desc.ko: After the fact, Sensei receives a letter from Ayane. Though the Foreclosure Task Force wasn't able to pay off its debt in full, she thanks [USERNAME] Sensei for preserving the group's usual way of life.
desc.zh_tw: 所有事件结束后，老师收到綾音寄来的信。綾音向[USERNAME]老师道谢说，虽然没完全还清债务，但是多亏了老师才守住對策委員會的日常。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 所有事件结束后，老师收到绫音寄来的信。绫音向[USERNAME]老师道谢说，虽然没完全还清债务，但是多亏了老师才守住对策委员会的日常。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 所有事件结束后，老师收到绫音寄来的信。绫音向[USERNAME]老师道谢说，虽然没完全还清债务，但是多亏了老师才守住对策委员会的日常。

desc.en: Thanks to Sensei's help, the Foreclosure Task Force has been officially recognized as a club in the school, and will be taking the role as the Student Council. Yet the President remains undecided.
desc.jp: Thanks to Sensei's help, the Foreclosure Task Force has been officially recognized as a club in the school, and will be taking the role as the Student Council. Yet the President remains undecided.
desc.thai: Thanks to Sensei's help, the Foreclosure Task Force has been officially recognized as a club in the school, and will be taking the role as the Student Council. Yet the President remains undecided.
desc.ko: Thanks to Sensei's help, the Foreclosure Task Force has been officially recognized as a club in the school, and will be taking the role as the Student Council. Yet the President remains undecided.

desc.en: Kaiser Credit had been under investigation by the General Student Council since then, for conducting illegal financial transactions in the black market. The director had also been listed as the main suspects in the illegal student kidnapping case and is wanted. In order to distance themselves from the incidents, Kaiser Corporation fired the director immediately. Loan-wise, interest rates have finally come down to even lower levels than ever before.

desc.zh_tw: 凯撒信贷已因在黑市进行非法金融交易而受到联邦学生会的调查，且凯撒公司董事也被列为学生非法劫持案的主要嫌疑人，并遭到通缉。凯撒公司为撇清关系，立刻解雇了董事。贷款方面，利息最终降到了比原来还低的水平。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
